source.sqlReaderQuery:
-- Query to extract "Closed AR" according new HighRadius specifications.
-- Last updated: 01.09.21

USE NAV5Live

-- DECLARE statements
DECLARE @CurrencyCode AS NVARCHAR(50)
SELECT @CurrencyCode = [LCY Code]
FROM dbo.[DSI GmbH Live$General Ledger Setup]

DECLARE @Company_ID AS NVARCHAR(50)
SELECT 
	@Company_ID = [No_]
FROM dbo.[DSI GmbH Live$DSI Partner]
WHERE [Own Company] = 1;

DECLARE @CountryCode AS NVARCHAR(50)
SELECT
	@CountryCode = [Country_Region Code]
FROM
	dbo.[DSI GmbH Live$Company Information];

-- WITH Statements
WITH
HoldbackCust AS (
	SELECT [Attached-to Cust_ Ledg_ Entry]
		,SUM(Amount) [Retention Amount]
		,MAX([Due Date]) AS [Retention Due Date]
		,MIN([Description Invoice]) AS [Description Invoice]
	FROM dbo.[DSI GmbH Live$DSI Holdback Customer]
	WHERE [Open] = 1
	AND [Holdback Code] IN ('GEWÄHR_5', 'SICH_10', 'DLZ')
	GROUP BY [Attached-to Cust_ Ledg_ Entry]
),
CustLedgEntry2 AS (
	SELECT CustLedgEntry.[Entry No_]
	FROM 
		dbo.[DSI GmbH Live$Cust_ Ledger Entry] CustLedgEntry
		LEFT JOIN dbo.[DSI GmbH Live$Customer] Cust ON CustLedgEntry.[Customer No_] = Cust.[No_]
	WHERE
		Cust.[No_] LIKE '2000%'
		AND CustLedgEntry.[Posting Date] = '20200101'
)

-- Main Query: SELECTs
SELECT
	'NAV' as ERP,
	@Company_ID AS Company_ID,
	[Customer No_] as Customer_No,
	Cust.Name as CustomerName,
	(SELECT
		SUM(Amount)
		FROM dbo.[DSI GmbH Live$Detailed Cust_ Ledg_ Entry] Details
		WHERE
			CustLedgEntry.[Entry No_] = Details.[Cust_ Ledger Entry No_]
		) AS Open_Amount,
	(SELECT
		SUM(Amount)
		FROM dbo.[DSI GmbH Live$Detailed Cust_ Ledg_ Entry] Details
		WHERE
			CustLedgEntry.[Entry No_] = Details.[Cust_ Ledger Entry No_]
			AND Details.[Entry Type] <> 2
			AND Details.[Entry Type] <> 10
			AND Details.[Entry Type] <> 11
		) AS Closed_Amount,
	CustLedgEntry.[Entry No_] AS [Application ID],
	CASE [Document Type]
			WHEN 0 THEN ''
			WHEN 1 THEN 'PAYMENT'
			WHEN 2 THEN 'INVOICE'
			WHEN 3 THEN 'CREDIT MEMO'
			WHEN 4 THEN 'FINANCE CHARGE MEMO'
			WHEN 5 THEN 'REMINDER'
			WHEN 6 THEN 'REFUND'
		END [Document_Type],
	[Document No_] as [Document No_],

	IIF(
		CustLedgEntry.[Closed by Entry No_] <> 0,
		(SELECT MIN([Document No_])
		FROM dbo.[DSI GmbH Live$Cust_ Ledger Entry] ApplyToCustLedg
		WHERE ApplyToCustLedg.[Entry No_] = CustLedgEntry.[Closed by Entry No_]),
		(SELECT MIN([Document No_])
		FROM dbo.[DSI GmbH Live$Cust_ Ledger Entry] ApplyToCustLedg
		WHERE ApplyToCustLedg.[Closed by Entry No_] = CustLedgEntry.[Entry No_])
	) AS Closed_By_Doc_Number,

	IIF(
		CustLedgEntry.[Closed by Entry No_] <> 0,
		(SELECT MIN([Entry No_])
		FROM dbo.[DSI GmbH Live$Cust_ Ledger Entry] ApplyToCustLedg
		WHERE ApplyToCustLedg.[Entry No_] = CustLedgEntry.[Closed by Entry No_]),
		(SELECT MIN([Entry No_])
		FROM dbo.[DSI GmbH Live$Cust_ Ledger Entry] ApplyToCustLedg
		WHERE ApplyToCustLedg.[Closed by Entry No_] = CustLedgEntry.[Entry No_])
	) AS Closed_By_Application_ID,

	CustLedgEntry.[Posting Date],
	CASE 
		WHEN Invoices.[Payment Terms Code] <> '' THEN Invoices.[Payment Terms Code]
		WHEN Cust.[Payment Terms Code] <> '' THEN Cust.[Payment Terms Code]
		ELSE NULL
	END AS [Payment Terms Code],
	CustLedgEntry.[Due Date],
	IIF(CustLedgEntry.[Currency Code] = '', @CurrencyCode, CustLedgEntry.[Currency Code]) AS Currency_Code,
	@CurrencyCode AS Local_Currency,
	NULL AS Purchase_Order,
	Invoices.[Order No_] AS Order_No,
	CustLedgEntry.[Pmt_ Disc_ Given (LCY)] AS Discount_Amount,
	IIF(CustLedgEntry.[Pmt_ Discount Date] = '1753-01-01', NULL, CustLedgEntry.[Pmt_ Discount Date]) AS Discount_Due_Date,
	IIF(CustLedgEntry.[Closed at Date] = '1753-01-01', NULL, CustLedgEntry.[Closed at Date]) AS Clearing_Date,
	CASE
		WHEN Cust.[Customer Posting Group] LIKE 'IC%' OR Cust.[Customer Posting Group] IN ('MERGER', 'BETR_STAET','BETEILIG') THEN 'INTERCOMPANY'
		ELSE DimValue.[Business Unit]
	END AS Business_Unit,
	IIF((ISNULL(RetentionAmt.[Retention Amount], 0.0) > 0.0), 1, 0) as Retention_Indicator,
	IIF(Invoices.[Ship-to Country_Region Code] = '', @CountryCode, Invoices.[Ship-to Country_Region Code]) AS Ship_To_Country_Code,
	IIF(CustLedgEntry.[Salesperson Code] = '', NULL, CustLedgEntry.[Salesperson Code]) AS [SalespersonCode],
	Salesperson.Name AS [SalespersonName],
	IIF(CustLedgEntry.[Global Dimension 2 Code] = '', NULL, CustLedgEntry.[Global Dimension 2 Code]) AS DSI_Job_No,
	RetentionAmt.[Retention Due Date],
	ISNULL(RetentionAmt.[Retention Amount], 0.0) AS [Retention_Amount],

-- Fields NOT required by HighRadius but added anyway
	IIF(RetentionAmt.[Description Invoice] IS NOT NULL, RetentionAmt.[Description Invoice], CustLedgEntry.[Description]) AS [Description],
	CustLedgEntry.[User ID]


-- FROM statements, including JOINs
FROM
dbo.[DSI GmbH Live$Cust_ Ledger Entry] CustLedgEntry
LEFT JOIN dbo.[DSI GmbH Live$Customer] Cust                     ON [Customer No_] = Cust.[No_]
LEFT JOIN dbo.[DSI GmbH Live$Sales Invoice Header] Invoices     ON [Document No_] = Invoices.[No_]
LEFT JOIN dbo.[DSI GmbH Live$DSI Job] DSIJob                    ON CustLedgEntry.[Global Dimension 2 Code] = DSIJob.No_
LEFT JOIN dbo.[DSI GmbH Live$Dimension Value] DimValue          ON CustLedgEntry.[Global Dimension 2 Code] = DimValue.Code
LEFT JOIN dbo.[DSI GmbH Live$Salesperson_Purchaser] Salesperson ON CustLedgEntry.[Salesperson Code] = Salesperson.Code
LEFT JOIN HoldbackCust RetentionAmt                             ON RetentionAmt.[Attached-to Cust_ Ledg_ Entry] = CustLedgEntry.[Entry No_]
LEFT JOIN CustLedgEntry2 Entry2                                 ON CustLedgEntry.[Entry No_] = Entry2.[Entry No_]

-- Final statements / conditions
WHERE
	(SELECT
		SUM(Amount)
		FROM dbo.[DSI GmbH Live$Detailed Cust_ Ledg_ Entry] Details
		WHERE
			CustLedgEntry.[Entry No_] = Details.[Cust_ Ledger Entry No_]
			AND Details.[Entry Type] <> 2
			AND Details.[Entry Type] <> 10
			AND Details.[Entry Type] <> 11
		) <> 0
	AND [Customer No_] <> '99999'
	AND [Open] = 0
	AND Cust.Recycling != 1
ORDER BY [Posting Date],[Customer No_],[Document No_]

-- Query to extract "Open AR" according new HighRadius specifications.
-- Last updated: 01.09.21

USE NAV5Live

-- DECLARE statements
DECLARE @CurrencyCode AS NVARCHAR(50)
SELECT @CurrencyCode = [LCY Code]
FROM dbo.[DSI GmbH Live$General Ledger Setup]

DECLARE @Company_ID AS NVARCHAR(50)
SELECT 
	@Company_ID = [No_]
FROM dbo.[DSI GmbH Live$DSI Partner]
WHERE [Own Company] = 1;

DECLARE @CountryCode AS NVARCHAR(50)
SELECT
	@CountryCode = [Country_Region Code]
FROM
	dbo.[DSI GmbH Live$Company Information];

-- WITH Statements
WITH
HoldbackCust AS (
	SELECT [Attached-to Cust_ Ledg_ Entry]
		,SUM(Amount) [Retention Amount]
		,MAX([Due Date]) AS [Retention Due Date]
		,MIN([Description Invoice]) AS [Description Invoice]
	FROM dbo.[DSI GmbH Live$DSI Holdback Customer]
	WHERE [Open] = 1
	AND [Holdback Code] IN ('GEWÄHR_5', 'SICH_10', 'DLZ')
	GROUP BY [Attached-to Cust_ Ledg_ Entry]
),
CustLedgEntry2 AS (
	SELECT CustLedgEntry.[Entry No_]
	FROM 
		dbo.[DSI GmbH Live$Cust_ Ledger Entry] CustLedgEntry
		LEFT JOIN dbo.[DSI GmbH Live$Customer] Cust ON CustLedgEntry.[Customer No_] = Cust.[No_]
	WHERE
		Cust.[No_] LIKE '2000%'
		AND CustLedgEntry.[Posting Date] = '20200101'
)

-- Main Query: SELECTs
SELECT
	'NAV' as ERP,
	@Company_ID AS Company_ID,
	[Customer No_] as Customer_No,
	Cust.Name as CustomerName,
	(SELECT
		SUM(Amount)
		FROM dbo.[DSI GmbH Live$Detailed Cust_ Ledg_ Entry] Details
		WHERE
			CustLedgEntry.[Entry No_] = Details.[Cust_ Ledger Entry No_]
		) AS Open_Amount,
	(SELECT
		SUM(Amount)
		FROM dbo.[DSI GmbH Live$Detailed Cust_ Ledg_ Entry] Details
		WHERE
			CustLedgEntry.[Entry No_] = Details.[Cust_ Ledger Entry No_]
			AND Details.[Entry Type] <> 2
			AND Details.[Entry Type] <> 10
			AND Details.[Entry Type] <> 11
		) AS Closed_Amount,
	CustLedgEntry.[Entry No_] AS [Application ID],
	CASE [Document Type]
			WHEN 0 THEN ''
			WHEN 1 THEN 'PAYMENT'
			WHEN 2 THEN 'INVOICE'
			WHEN 3 THEN 'CREDIT MEMO'
			WHEN 4 THEN 'FINANCE CHARGE MEMO'
			WHEN 5 THEN 'REMINDER'
			WHEN 6 THEN 'REFUND'
		END [Document_Type],
	[Document No_] as [Document No_],

	IIF(
		CustLedgEntry.[Closed by Entry No_] <> 0,
		(SELECT MIN([Document No_])
		FROM dbo.[DSI GmbH Live$Cust_ Ledger Entry] ApplyToCustLedg
		WHERE ApplyToCustLedg.[Entry No_] = CustLedgEntry.[Closed by Entry No_]),
		(SELECT MIN([Document No_])
		FROM dbo.[DSI GmbH Live$Cust_ Ledger Entry] ApplyToCustLedg
		WHERE ApplyToCustLedg.[Closed by Entry No_] = CustLedgEntry.[Entry No_])
	) AS Closed_By_Doc_Number,

	IIF(
		CustLedgEntry.[Closed by Entry No_] <> 0,
		(SELECT MIN([Entry No_])
		FROM dbo.[DSI GmbH Live$Cust_ Ledger Entry] ApplyToCustLedg
		WHERE ApplyToCustLedg.[Entry No_] = CustLedgEntry.[Closed by Entry No_]),
		(SELECT MIN([Entry No_])
		FROM dbo.[DSI GmbH Live$Cust_ Ledger Entry] ApplyToCustLedg
		WHERE ApplyToCustLedg.[Closed by Entry No_] = CustLedgEntry.[Entry No_])
	) AS Closed_By_Application_ID,

	CustLedgEntry.[Posting Date],
	CASE 
		WHEN Invoices.[Payment Terms Code] <> '' THEN Invoices.[Payment Terms Code]
		WHEN Cust.[Payment Terms Code] <> '' THEN Cust.[Payment Terms Code]
		ELSE NULL
	END AS [Payment Terms Code],
	CustLedgEntry.[Due Date],
	IIF(CustLedgEntry.[Currency Code] = '', @CurrencyCode, CustLedgEntry.[Currency Code]) AS Currency_Code,
	@CurrencyCode AS Local_Currency,
	NULL AS Purchase_Order,
	Invoices.[Order No_] AS Order_No,
	CustLedgEntry.[Pmt_ Disc_ Given (LCY)] AS Discount_Amount,
	IIF(CustLedgEntry.[Pmt_ Discount Date] = '1753-01-01', NULL, CustLedgEntry.[Pmt_ Discount Date]) AS Discount_Due_Date,
	IIF(CustLedgEntry.[Closed at Date] = '1753-01-01', NULL, CustLedgEntry.[Closed at Date]) AS Clearing_Date,
	CASE
		WHEN Cust.[Customer Posting Group] LIKE 'IC%' OR Cust.[Customer Posting Group] IN ('MERGER', 'BETR_STAET','BETEILIG') THEN 'INTERCOMPANY'
		ELSE DimValue.[Business Unit]
	END AS Business_Unit,
	IIF((ISNULL(RetentionAmt.[Retention Amount], 0.0) > 0.0), 1, 0) as Retention_Indicator,
	IIF(Invoices.[Ship-to Country_Region Code] = '', @CountryCode, Invoices.[Ship-to Country_Region Code]) AS Ship_To_Country_Code,
	IIF(CustLedgEntry.[Salesperson Code] = '', NULL, CustLedgEntry.[Salesperson Code]) AS [SalespersonCode],
	Salesperson.Name AS [SalespersonName],
	IIF(CustLedgEntry.[Global Dimension 2 Code] = '', NULL, CustLedgEntry.[Global Dimension 2 Code]) AS DSI_Job_No,
	RetentionAmt.[Retention Due Date],
	ISNULL(RetentionAmt.[Retention Amount], 0.0) AS [Retention_Amount],

-- Fields NOT required by HighRadius but added anyway
	IIF(RetentionAmt.[Description Invoice] IS NOT NULL, RetentionAmt.[Description Invoice], CustLedgEntry.[Description]) AS [Description],
	CustLedgEntry.[User ID]


-- FROM statements, including JOINs
FROM
dbo.[DSI GmbH Live$Cust_ Ledger Entry] CustLedgEntry
LEFT JOIN dbo.[DSI GmbH Live$Customer] Cust                     ON [Customer No_] = Cust.[No_]
LEFT JOIN dbo.[DSI GmbH Live$Sales Invoice Header] Invoices     ON [Document No_] = Invoices.[No_]
LEFT JOIN dbo.[DSI GmbH Live$DSI Job] DSIJob                    ON CustLedgEntry.[Global Dimension 2 Code] = DSIJob.No_
LEFT JOIN dbo.[DSI GmbH Live$Dimension Value] DimValue          ON CustLedgEntry.[Global Dimension 2 Code] = DimValue.Code
LEFT JOIN dbo.[DSI GmbH Live$Salesperson_Purchaser] Salesperson ON CustLedgEntry.[Salesperson Code] = Salesperson.Code
LEFT JOIN HoldbackCust RetentionAmt                             ON RetentionAmt.[Attached-to Cust_ Ledg_ Entry] = CustLedgEntry.[Entry No_]
LEFT JOIN CustLedgEntry2 Entry2                                 ON CustLedgEntry.[Entry No_] = Entry2.[Entry No_]

-- Final statements / conditions
WHERE
	(SELECT
		SUM(Amount)
		FROM dbo.[DSI GmbH Live$Detailed Cust_ Ledg_ Entry] Details
		WHERE
			CustLedgEntry.[Entry No_] = Details.[Cust_ Ledger Entry No_]
			AND Details.[Entry Type] <> 2
			AND Details.[Entry Type] <> 10
			AND Details.[Entry Type] <> 11
		) <> 0
	AND [Customer No_] <> '99999'
	AND [Open] = 1
	AND Cust.Recycling != 1
ORDER BY [Posting Date],[Customer No_],[Document No_]
